entry.title: Stood Right Here
entry.summary:
Author: Duochanfan

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,789Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 12

Summary: Eddie falls into a coma, and Buck makes the decision to bring Christopher home, but it’s not just as easy as telling Helena and Ramon Diaz that their son is in a coma and that Christopher has to return home. Nothing could ever be that easy when it comes to Helena and Ramon Diaz. But Buck has a few people up his sleeve to help bring Christopher home, to where he belongs.

entry.title: Second Chances
entry.summary:
Author: starylighting

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 542,634Chapters: 59/?Kudos: 68

Summary: Bobby and Athena are just two people trying to put their lives back together while figuring out how to co-parent. What starts as a complicated plan to foster kids in need slowly turns into something much deeper. Through the ups and downs of heartbreak, healing, and raising children who’ve been through so much, they find strength in each other. Over time, their partnership grows into love, and together, they build a story about family, trust, and second chances.

entry.title: Evergrowing
entry.summary:
Author: starylighting

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 333,917Chapters: 52/?Kudos: 23

Summary: Athena and Bobby are learning that parenting doesn’t end when the kids turn eighteen. With three grown children and two still at home, Bobby and Athena find themselves navigating new challenges at every stage of life. Each child carries their own struggles, some spoken and some hidden, but together the family works through the ups and downs with love, patience, and resilience. At the heart of it all, they’re reminded that family is a bond that grows, shifts, and deepens, no matter how old the kids get.

entry.title: I love you (desperately)
entry.summary:
Author: buckleyys118

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 22,888Chapters: 7/7Kudos: 321

Summary: “Can I kiss you?” Buck asks. 'Just as a distraction' he lies to himself.Eddie nods rapidly and Buck is latching onto his lips before the motion’s even done.It’s filthy, the feeling of Eddie’s lips sliding against his, wet with tears and sweat, while his hips jerk against Buck’s thigh in desperate motions.“God, you’re so hot.” The words slip out but Eddie moans back. “So out of your mind like this, I love it.”It’s too close to the truth, the truth of how he feels.“Can’t—” Eddie ruts frantically against Buck. “Gonna—”“You’re okay.” Buck soothes, pressing another kiss to the other man’s lips.“Buck” Eddie writhes, movements becoming more and more dire by the second.“Let it go” Buck demands.Eddie shakes his head. “Not time”“Do it for me. Let it go” Eddie remains stubborn, even as his body begins to lose control, shaking with effort. “Give up control for me. You’re okay, you’re safe with me.”--Each chapter can be read as a stand alone or read in line. :)Warning: Contains desperation play and a lot of explicit sexual content

entry.title: nothing fake about the way you bring me to life
entry.summary:
Author: lalbatros

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 18,558Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 108

Summary: “Eddie, I know you know how that would look. Your parents are gonna think— And I know they’re like really Catholic. And not like Bobby Catholic.”Eddie lets out a soft laugh. “Quite frankly… I don’t care. In fact, I welcome it.”Buck frowns. “Why would you—”“Because I really don’t want to hear all about how I’m a fuck up of a father right now,” Eddie interrupts sharply. “And if that means hearing all about another way I’ve disappointed them, then so be it.”--or, a season 9 christmas fic where eddie's parents come to LA except buck never moved out and eddie seems to want his parents to think they're dating???

entry.title: The Lightning Within
entry.summary:
Author: Karin1232

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,916Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 44

Summary: “I’ll handle this,” Phillip said, voice clipped. “You’ve done enough.” Eddie froze. “Don’t—” But Phillip was already crouching, grabbing Buck by the arm and hauling him upright. Buck’s legs buckled instantly, his body sagging like a marionette with cut strings. “Stand up,” Phillip snapped. “Stop being such a damn liability.” Buck whimpered, a broken sound, and then his knees gave out completely. Phillip let go. OR What is supposed to be nice day turns into chaos when Buck has an epileptic seizure at Bobby’s place. Not everyone is as supporting as his boyfriend Eddie.

entry.title: Exhaustion Lines
entry.summary:
Author: 79KJ01

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 15,182Chapters: 17/20Kudos: 149

Summary: Buck hears the word once — in the wrong moment, in the wrong state of mind — and it sinks its teeth in. What should have been a passing comment twists into a truth he can’t shake, convincing him that everyone in his life is worn down by the weight of him. As he withdraws, slipping further into a quiet, dangerous spiral, the people who love him fight to remind him of one thing he can’t see on his own: he was never exhausting… only terrified of being left behind. Exhausting (adj.): not someone who is too much to love — but someone too important to lose.
